definition: Luoyang prefecture-level city in Henan, an old capital from pre-Han times

sentences.english: In 771 B. C, the capital was moved eastward to Luoyang in present-day Henan Province.
sentences.chinese: 公元前771年，周的首都東遷到了現河南省的洛陽。

sentences.english: I love peonies, for its central riches and honor, negligently held on king of flowers.
sentences.chinese: 我愛洛陽花，中州富貴一把抓，花王地位坐地拿。

sentences.english: The Silk Road always started from Loyang the ancient capital of China.
sentences.chinese: 絲綢之路一直是從中國的古都洛陽開始。

sentences.english: Luoyang City is the most suitable region for flower, especially for peony.
sentences.chinese: 洛陽地脈花最宜，牡丹尤爲天下奇。

sentences.english: Jiang, Swallow worry fans the right month, the cuckoo Luoyang smoke break.
sentences.chinese: 燕子愁迷江右月，杜鵑聲破洛陽煙。

sentences.english: The beauty of Luoyang Peony Chuo must not only, but also of great medicinal value.
sentences.chinese: 洛陽的牡丹不僅丰姿綽絕，而且具有很大的藥用價值。

sentences.english: Han Guangwu, the directors declared that Luoyang is a typical one.
sentences.chinese: 東漢光武帝時，洛陽令董宣便是其中典型的一員。

sentences.english: I can not forget is that the sedan chair sitting in the drive when Luoyang.
sentences.chinese: 我忘不了的，是坐着花轎在洛陽兜風的時候。

sentences.english: Left cold zen have received yue not the cluster to luoyang gold knife the wangs movements.
sentences.chinese: 左冷禪還收到了嶽不羣去洛陽金刀王家的行蹤。

sentences.english: When flowers bloom into April, Luoyang became a sea of flowers.
sentences.chinese: 每當到了百花怒放的四月份，洛陽就成了花的海洋。

sentences.english: The Longmen Grottos are situated on the bank of the Yi River in Luoyang, Henan Province.
sentences.chinese: 龍門石窟座落在河南省洛陽伊水兩岸。

sentences.english: In recent years, there are some new materials about Northern Wei Dynasty epitaphs unearthed in Luoyang.
sentences.chinese: 近年來，洛陽出土北魏墓誌又出現了一些新的材料。

sentences.english: Here in a very short period of time will become the Luoyang new central business district .
sentences.chinese: 在這裏很短的時間內將成爲洛陽市新的中央商務區。

sentences.english: When they both went to Luoyang to carry out the task, they were recognized by Liu Xiantang and suffered the arrest.
sentences.chinese: 兩人去洛陽執行任務，被劉仙堂認出而遭逮捕。

sentences.english: And Luoyang City real estate market is still in full swing.
sentences.chinese: 和洛陽市的房地產市場仍處於全面展開。

sentences.english: This "urban card "of the peony fair has already spread the graceful name of Luoyang everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 牡丹花會這張“城市名片”已把洛陽的美名四海傳揚。
